alert.note: Alert for Yavapai County Mountains; Yavapai County Valleys and Basins (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 23 at 7:20PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Yavapai County through 800 PM MST near Chino Valley... At 718 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Prescott Airport, or 7 miles southeast of Chino Valley, moving northwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds of up to 40 mph, heavy rainfall, and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects and minor damage is possible. This includes the following highways... State Route 89 between mile markers 317 and 332. State Route 89A between mile markers 318 and 332. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to minor flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Yavapai County Mountains; Yavapai County Valleys and Basins
